title: Unable to purchase RP - getting a white screen
body:
Hi there,

Trying to purchase RP and I get a white screen with this text on it:
"Failed to load URL "https://plstore.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error "ERR_TIMED_OUT" (-7)." 

I'm in OCE, NSW specifically, logging on the OCE client. I've reset my router, reset my computer, updated everything, but still unable to spend my hard earnt cash on league lol

Any ideas?

replies.body: Update!  It looks like purchasing RP with a credit card was down for a short period on a few regions.  Everything should be operational at this point!
Having the same problem here in Victoria as well

Hey guys, this issue is usually caused by a network problem failing to reach our services.  This can come up in loading errors or failure to download assets resulting in white or black screens.  It's really strange though that there are quite a few of you getting this error.  Is this still an issue for you?
All fixed now. You have my monies babz.

I'm having the same problem 
but I'm in QLD this is happening
Failed to load URL "https://plstore.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error 
riot explanation?
